title: North Carolina Firm Recalls Chicken Breast Product Due To Misbranding And An Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, May 24, 2012 - Mt. Airy Meat Center, a Mt. Airy, N.C. establishment, is recalling approximately 100 pounds of a frozen, raw chicken breast product because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen. The product contains wheat, a known allergen that is not declared on...

establishment.name: Mt. Airy Meat Center, Inc.
establishment.address:
133 Old Buck Shoals Rd. 
  Mt. Airy, NC 27030

impacted_products: Individual vacuum-sealed packages of “MT. AIRY MEAT CENTER MESQUITE CHICKEN BREAST RAW READY TO COOK,” weighing approximately 1.5 pounds each.
